definition: household electric appliance/abbr. for 家用電器|家用电器

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Big opportunities seen in small cities.
sentences.chinese: 中國小城市家電市場潛能巨大。

sentences.english: The fourth industry Apple could potentially impact is the appliance industry.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果還可以進行改變的第四個領域是家電行業。

sentences.english: Once, home appliance enterprise of China, how does longing have his heart.
sentences.chinese: 曾經，中國的家電企業，多麼渴望有自己的心臟。

sentences.english: This site is an online mall for home appliances.
sentences.chinese: 本網站是用於家電產品的網上商城。

sentences.english: Why on the contrary do those so-called multifunctional home appliances make person antipathetic?
sentences.chinese: 那些所謂的多功能家電爲什麼反而使人反感？

sentences.english: The chapter 3 demonstrates the mode transformation course of TCL white household electrical appliance distributing channel.
sentences.chinese: 第3章是分析TCL白家電渠道分銷模式的演變過程。

sentences.english: It shows that the formability of steel sheet for home electrical appliances made by Shougang is quite well.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，該家電板具有良好的力學性能和成形性能。

sentences.english: The attractive and durable household electrical appliances sell well.
sentences.chinese: 美觀耐用的家電用品，暢銷於市。

sentences.english: Since China had entered WTO, the enterprises of household electric production face the international challenge.
sentences.chinese: 加入WTO之後，我國家電業面臨國際競爭的挑戰。

sentences.english: Around 15000 NTD, all necessary household appliances, an air conditioner, and Northern-Southern exposure would be best.
sentences.chinese: 一萬五左右，家電齊全，有冷氣，最好是座北朝南的。

sentences.english: Finally, the application perspectives of Bluetooth wireless technology are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 給出了藍牙技術在信息家電等系統的應用示例。

sentences.english: Brand appliances all worthy, environmental pollution, import furniture.
sentences.chinese: 品牌家電全配，進口傢俱，環保無污染。

sentences.english: He decided to take an examination of small home appliance make endowment money, do not rely on mulan.
sentences.chinese: 他決定考修小家電賺養老錢，不依賴木蘭。

sentences.english: This home uses only the most energy-efficient appliances, further reducing its energy footprint.
sentences.chinese: 這間房子只使用最節能的家電，進一步減少了碳足跡。

sentences.english: Besides, there are also encouraging responses from some well-known enterprises of small electric appliances of the Yangtze River Delta region.
sentences.chinese: 此外，長三角地區域著名小家電企業亦踊躍參展。

sentences.english: The prototype has been finally developed, and was put into employment in the recycling demonstration line of electrical home appliances.
sentences.chinese: 所研製出的樣機已在家電回收示範線投入使用。
